We sent our child for a trial at Power Kids to brush up on his weaker gross motor skills. We then decided to sign up with them after seeing how much he enjoyed the varied class activities together with other children. Special thanks to Tr Stacy and Sam for being ever so so patient and inclusive towards my child. Our child has been asking to go for gym classes, and this is testiment of your good work!
